- [ ] The behaviour of the program is deviated from what is described in the documentation.
- [ ] I've [searched](https://github.com/cjbarrie/academictwitteR/issues?q=) for previous reported issues. This bug has not been reported.
- [ ] I can reproduce the bug for more than one time.
- [ ] This is NOT a 3-digit error, e.g. `something went wrong. Status code: 400.`
- [ ] This is a 3-digit error and I have consulted the [Understanding API errors](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/academictwitteR/vignettes/academictwitteR-errors.html) vignette and the suggestions do not help.

If you can't check most of the boxes above, it is probably not a bug. Please consider using [academictwitteR Discussions ](https://github.com/cjbarrie/academictwitteR/discussions) instead.

A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.
